item.title: Trump Frenzy Triggers Inflows of $2.2B into Digital Asset Products: CoinShares
item.description:
CoinShares reports $2.2B weekly inflows into digital assets, the highest of 2025, fueled by Trump inauguration-driven optimism. Bitcoin leads with $1.9B, Ethereum reverses outflows with $246M, and XRP gains $31M. Total assets under management reach a record $171B, showcasing growing market interest.

item.title: CERT-UA Warns of Cyber Scams Using Fake AnyDesk Requests for Fraudulent Security Audits
item.description:

item.title: PNGPlug Loader Delivers ValleyRAT Malware Through Fake Software Installers
item.description:
Cybersecurity researchers are calling attention to a series of cyber attacks that have targeted Chinese-speaking regions like Hong Kong, Taiwan, and Mainland China with a known malware called ValleyRAT.
The attacks leverage a multi-stage loader dubbed PNGPlug to deliver the ValleyRAT payload, Intezer said in a technical report published last week.

item.title: Bcachefs Changes Merged Without Issue For The Linux 6.14 Kernel
item.description: As a follow-up to yesterday's article around the on-disk format changes and other feature work on Bcachefs for Linux 6.14, the changes ended up being merged without issue for this next kernel version. That came after the Bcachefs changes were rejected during the Linux 6.13 cycle due to a Code of Conduct (CoC) committee decision...
